bullets: The Volt 2 will be available from October 1st for £499 (about $670).
Read more about how we evaluate products.

Table of contents
Best Apple Watch in 2025
Chip: S10 SiP | Sensors: ECG, heart rate, temperature, compass, altimeter, accelerometer, fall/crash detection | Display: Always‑on Retina wide-angle OLED display, max 2,000 nits brightness | Battery life: 18 hours | Case size: 42mm or 46mm
In her review, Engadget’s Cherlynn Low said the new watch was noticeably thinner and lighter, though that didn’t make a huge difference in comfort between the new version and its predecessor.
While it’s not intended for people who already know they have the disorder, it could help identify certain breathing patterns during sleep that should be checked out by a doctor.
That feature will also be available on the Apple Watch Series 9 with watchOS 11.
Battery life didn’t change drastically — Apple still promises an 18-hour stretch per charge — and that comparatively short span has always been our biggest complaint with the watch.
If you’ve got a Series 9, you can probably wait on an upgrade.

item.title: Technology Sep 3, 2025 Apple AirPods Pro 3 may launch next week, rumoured to come with heart rate and temperature sensors Apple is anticipated to unveil the AirPods Pro 3 alongside the iPhone 17 series at its upcoming 'Awe Dropping' event. The new AirPods Pro 3 are rumored to include heart rate and temperature sensors for enhanced health tracking. Improved sound quality, enhanced active noise cancellation, design refinements, and deeper integration with iOS and Apple Health are also expected.

review.headline_rewrite: Technology Sep 3, 2025 Apple AirPods Pro 3 may launch next week, rumoured to come with heart rate and temperature sensors Apple is anticipated to unveil the AirPods Pro 3 alongside the iPhone 17 series at its upcoming 'Awe Dropping' event. The new AirPods Pro 3 are rumored to include heart rate and temperature sensors for enhanced health tracking. Improved sound quality, enhanced active noise cancellation, design refinements, and deeper integration with iOS and Apple Health are also expected.
bullets: Apple AirPods Pro 3 are expected to launch next week.

The upcoming iPhone models include iPhone 17,
iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max and the rumoured iPhone 17 Air.
Along with the new iPhone 17 series models, Apple is also rumoured to announce a third-generation AirPods Pro model.
The rumour mill has been churning leaks around the upcoming AirPods Pro 3.

Hereâs what to expect
2 new health features coming with AirPods Pro 3
An unnamed source (as reported by 9to5Mac) has said that the new AirPods Pro 3 may come with two new health features.
Heart rate sensing had been rumored for a while, and with its debut on the Beats Powerbeats Pro 2, the featureâs arrival became more likely on the AirPods Pro 3.

item.title: Missing minute in Jeffrey Epstein jail security video revealed in document dump

review.headline_rewrite: Missing minute in Jeffrey Epstein jail security video revealed in document dump

bullets:
Grammarly launches new AI agents to assist students and professionals with writing tasks
Grammarly has introduced eight new AI agents within its AI writing surface, 'docs,' designed to aid students and professionals with diverse writing tasks.
These agents offer functionalities like citation finding, plagiarism checking, and AI detection, alongside features predicting reader reactions and providing rubric-based feedback.
This launch signifies Grammarly's move towards agent-based AI to enhance writing across various platforms.
